Review Title: A BRANDED AND AFFORDABLE COMPACT FOR INDIAN SKIN TONE.
Review Body:
This is a branded yet affordable, matte finish compact powder for daily wear . I found this affordable and effective range of Maybelline Fit Me products during my product research. This Compact Powder pack is available in 6 unique shades. I have a fair skin tone and so I choose to order 330 TOFFEE shades for my skin. The 8 gms powder cake is packed in a beautiful-looking black round box, it has a round sponge applicator and a mirror on the lid. The Maybelline compact powder comes in an easy-to-use and easy-to-carry pack. I got it for a deal price of just Rs.180/- and I am very happy about it. This Compact Powder offers a matte finish and 12 hours of oil control with the goodness of SPF28 PA+++ to give complete sun protection.
I do not like to use a lot of make-up actually and I am not a makeup expert. I use this Maybelline Fit me compact powder over Maybelline Fit me matte plus a poreless liquid foundation of the same shade 330 TOFFEE. This compact powder when applied using the sponge applicator on the liquid foundation, it forms a thin layer giving a natural-looking matte finish. This 330 TOFFEE shade suits my skin tone nicely. Before starting the makeup, I do cleanse my face first and apply a light moisturizer. On that I apply liquid foundation first, I do not use concealer, then I use Maybelline Fit Me Compact powder to layer the skin with a natural and matte finish. The liquid foundation easily covers my dark spots and uneven skin tone with its medium coverage. The compact powder applied over it feels lightweight and offers a comfortable natural matte look for a longer time.
